title: Barbecued chicken with olive and caper stuffing
ingredients: ['140g black olives, pitted', '45g capers, drained well', '2 cloves garlic', '1 (25g) pack flat-leaf parsley, roughly chopped', '1/4 teaspoon dried crushed chillies', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '6 tablespoons olive oil', '3 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
